meanings.sent1: The flower exserts its petals to attract bees.
meanings.sent2: The snake exserts its fangs when feeling threatened.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel exserts its head from the tree hollow to peek outside.
meanings.sent4: The volcano exserts molten lava during an eruption.
meanings.sent5: The superhero exserts incredible strength to lift the heavy boulder.

meanings.sent1: The tree exserts its branches towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The turtle exserts its head from its shell cautiously.
meanings.sent3: The balloon exserts air when squeezed, making a funny noise.
meanings.sent4: The mountain exserts its peak above the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar exserts tiny legs to crawl along the leaf.
